title: Stop This Madness Now! (Ep 1235)
description:
In this episode, I address the outrageous comments by these two liberal lawmakers regarding the failed lockdowns. I also address new information regarding the deep hole John Brennan is in for his role in the Spygate scandal. 

News Picks:

Another 4.4 million Americans are out of work.

Another stunning act of media misinformation and misdirection.


New evidence casts doubt on Obama’s intelligence operation on Russia. 

The government debt crisis is about to explode. 

A political war is breaking out over mail-in voting.

Did mitigation really save two million lives?
